I am a passionate software developer, with interest in the areas of distributed systems, data science and full-stack web development. My analytical skills and programming experience are backed by a lifelong passion for technology, and my background in business helps me take a holistic view of the problem at hand. In addition, my sales experience taught me the tremendous value of clear communication.

As a team member, I value a culture of diversity, achievement and mutual growth. I know the importance of organizational learning, and support this by sharing my knowledge and learning from others. I thrive when challenged, love learning, building things and exploring ideas.

Work Experience

Cross-sector Structural Improvement Engineer & Data Engineer @ ASML


Semiconductor equipment manufacturing 		September 2018 - present

Lead developer role in team developing a Python application for parsing, analyzing and pseudonymizing photolithography fab automation logs (Django, Pandas). Development of backend microservices (Java, Spring Boot). Collaborating with architect and project lead on requirements gathering, prioritizing, planning and estimation. Focus on improving team workflow through mentoring, code reviews, pair programming and tech presentations. Redesign and implementation of application GUI. Rotating scrum master role. Deployment of application onsite at customer lithography fab.

Full-stack Software Developer @ SolarMonkey


B2B software for solar PV system design and forecasting 		August 2016 - August 2018

Development, deployment and maintenance of a fullstack application (Django + AngularJS). Integration with external CRM software through REST API and webhooks. Building solar system performance monitoring and internal analytics tools. Implementing recommendations for solar inverters based on solar system characteristics. Focus on test-driven development and devops practices. Interviewing new employees and mentoring of interns.

Data Analytics Intern @ SolarMonkey


B2B software for solar PV system design and forecasting 		March 2016 - July 2016

Improving prediction accuracy of solar panel output through accounting for various losses. Risk classification of new customers using machine learning. Automating report generation and other operational processes using Python.

Projects

MSc Thesis - "On the Economic Value of Renewable Energy Cooperatives"

Cost/benefit analysis of solar PV cooperatives through stochastic simulation and time series forecasting. Review of renewable energy topics, in particular solar PV panels, battery storage and microgrids. Data analysis in R of electricity generation and consumption time series data from hundreds of households over a 4 year period, with hourly and minute resolutions.
